languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю. Кровь к вам в купальню залил некий старший трубовед Гведон. Кровь он слил из тела своего напарника, рабочего по имени Орто. Внешне он выглядел как обычный человек, но вскрытие обнаружило в его внутренностях чудовищные мутации. Гведона прямо сейчас конвоируют сюда".
languages.translation_comment: вход если игнорили квест, после CulpritFound_prompt
вход если игнорили квест, после CulpritFound_prompt

languages.text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю. Кровь к вам в купальню залил некий старший трубовед Гведон. Кровь он слил из тела своего напарника, рабочего по имени Орто. Внешне он выглядел как обычный человек, но вскрытие обнаружило в его внутренностях чудовищные мутации. Гведона прямо сейчас конвоируют сюда".

languages.text: « Il y a du nouveau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : nous avons identifié l'individu qui a déversé tout ce sang dans votre cabine de bain. Le coupable est un égoutier supérieur répondant au nom de Gwedon. Il a vidé de son sang le corps de son partenaire, un ouvrier dénommé Orto. Si la victime avait l'air d'un humain ordinaire, l'autopsie a révélé d'affreuses mutations au niveau de ses organes internes. Gwedon a été placé sous bonne escorte et il ne devrait pas tarder à se présenter devant nous. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, informe: hemos identificado al responsable de verter la sangre en su cámara de baño. Es el inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon. Drenó la sangre del cadáver de su compañero, un trabajador llamado Orto. La víctima parecía un humano corriente, pero la autopsia ha revelado terribles mutaciones en sus órganos internos. Mis guardias están escoltando a Gwedon hasta aquí».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, informe: hemos identificado al responsable de verter la sangre en su cámara de baño. Es el inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon. Drenó la sangre del cadáver de su compañero, un trabajador llamado Orto. La víctima parecía un humano corriente, pero la autopsia ha revelado terribles mutaciones en sus órganos internos. Mis guardias están escoltando a Gwedon hasta aquí».

languages.text: “向您报告，舰长大人，我们已经找到了那个在您的浴池里放血的犯人。犯人是高阶管道员戈登，他杀害了他的工友，一个叫奥托的工人，放干了受害者的血。尽管受害者看起来像个正常人，但尸检报告显示，受害者的内脏发生了可怕的突变。我们的人正在把戈登押送到这里。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."

traits.locale_text: “向您报告，舰长大人，我们已经找到了那个在您的浴池里放血的犯人。犯人是高阶管道员戈登，他杀害了他的工友，一个叫奥托的工人，放干了受害者的血。尽管受害者看起来像个正常人，但尸检报告显示，受害者的内脏发生了可怕的突变。我们的人正在把戈登押送到这里。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、容疑者が分かりました。あなたの浴場に血を流させた、犯人を特定しました。犯人は、犯人は上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンです。グウェドンは相棒のオルトという労働者の死体から血を抜いたんです。被害者は普通の人間かと思われていましたが、解剖の結果、内臓に恐ろしい変異が見つかりました。グウェドンは現在、ここに護送されています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、容疑者が分かりました。あなたの浴場に血を流させた、犯人を特定しました。犯人は、犯人は上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンです。グウェドンは相棒のオルトという労働者の死体から血を抜いたんです。被害者は普通の人間かと思われていましたが、解剖の結果、内臓に恐ろしい変異が見つかりました。グウェドンは現在、ここに護送されています」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich erstatte Bericht: Wir haben den Täter identifiziert, der das Blut in Euer Badegemach eingeleitet hat. Es war der leitende Rohrhüter Gwedon. Gwedon hat seinen Partner getötet und ausbluten lassen, einen Arbeiter namens Orto. Das Opfer sah aus wie ein normaler Mensch, doch die Autopsie hat grauenhafte Mutationen seiner inneren Organe offenbart. Gwedon wird just in diesem Augenblick hergebracht."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich erstatte Bericht: Wir haben den Täter identifiziert, der das Blut in Euer Badegemach eingeleitet hat. Es war der leitende Rohrhüter Gwedon. Gwedon hat seinen Partner getötet und ausbluten lassen, einen Arbeiter namens Orto. Das Opfer sah aus wie ein normaler Mensch, doch die Autopsie hat grauenhafte Mutationen seiner inneren Organe offenbart. Gwedon wird just in diesem Augenblick hergebracht."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, raporumu sunuyorum: Hamamınızı kana bulayan failin kimliğini tespit ettik. Suçlu, Gwedon ismindeki kıdemli bir hat muhafızı. Ortağı da Orto adında bir işçi. Gwedon, ortağının cesedinin damarlarındaki tüm kanı çekmiş. Kurban sıradan bir insan gibi görünse de otopsi, iç organlarında korkunç mutasyonlar olduğunu açığa çıkardı. Şu an Gwedon buraya getiriliyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: we have identified the perpetrator who introduced the blood to your bathchamber. The culprit is senior pipewarden Gwedon. Gwedon drained the blood from the dead body of his partner, a worker by the name of Orto. The victim looked like a normal human; however, the autopsy has revealed horrific mutations in his internal organs. Gwedon is being escorted here as we speak."
